feature.label: NetzDatenStrom Proxy Test Feature
feature.description: This feature bundles all plug-ins that are needed to test the use cases of the module named "Big Data Archive" of the research project NetzDatenStrom (NDS). (1) read measurements in CIM/XML, (2) check measurements with help of historical data, and (3) check measurements with help of weather data.
